price: Göklerde ve yerdeki her şey O’nundur. Her zaman din O’na aittir. O halde Allah’tan başkasından mı sakınıyorsunuz?
arabic: وَلَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَهُ ٱلدِّينُ وَاصِبًاۚ أَفَغَيۡرَ ٱللَّهِ تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walahu mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi walahu al-dīnu wāṣiban afaghayra al-lahi tattaqūna
